intro: Ptilotus daphne, commonly known as the desert lily, is a flowering plant native to Australia. It belongs to the Malvaceae family and is characterized by its striking, showy flowers that range in color from pink to red. The plant is adapted to arid environments, featuring succulent leaves and a deep root system for water storage.
